name: Oil-Free Economy
title: Minimal Oil Dependency
description: In 2021, Slovenia's oil rents accounted for a mere 0.00003% of its GDP, showcasing its minimal reliance on oil revenues compared to other nations.

name: Poverty Progress
title: Low Societal Poverty Levels
description: As of 2022, only 6.5% of Slovenia's population lived below the societal poverty line, indicating a relatively low poverty rate compared to global standards.
